event.title: FOSDEM '25 - Informal Women* Breakfast in Brussels, Belgium

body.p: Join us for this informal and relaxed meeting to connect with other QWLINTA*s around you and discuss Free Software and how to create a more welcoming space for QWLINTA*s in the movement. If you are planning to come, please fill in this form so we can reserve an appropriate space according to our needs.
*QWLINTA: Queer, women, lesbians, intersex, non-binary, trans and agender
